title: Africa: the land and its people. No. 2
brief_description: Magazine items: Fruit and vegetable growing in the Union of South Africa for home use, export and canning. World famous archeologist L’Abbe Breuil at work among the Bushmen, a dwindling tribe of nomadic hunters who have left a history of primitive man in their cave paintings.
